role.name: ALL_FUSION_ROLES_ALL_DATA_ROLES
role.display-name: All Fusion Roles - All Data Roles
role.description: This role will inherit all Data Roles and all Enterprise roles that do not have a Data Role

role.name: ASM_APPLICATION_IMPLEMENTATION_CONSULTANT_JOB
role.description: Manages enterprise-wide implementations. Collaborates with specific application administrators to implement consistent enterprise application setup, architecture, information, rules, and access. Has access to all setup tasks across all products.

role.name: HRC_HUMAN_CAPITAL_MANAGEMENT_APPLICATION_ADMINISTRATOR_JOB
role.description: Configures the Oracle Fusion Global Human Resources application and has access to all duty roles necessary to implement the Compensation, Workforce Deployment, and Workforce Development offerings.

role.name: PER_EMPLOYEE_ABSTRACT
role.description: Identifies the person as an employee.

role.name: PER_LINE_MANAGER_ABSTRACT
role.description: Identifies the person as a line manager.

app-role.name: HWR_WORKFORCE_MEDIA_POLICY_COMPLIANCE_MANAGEMENT_DUTY
app-role.display-name: Workforce Media Policy Compliance Management Duty
app-role.description: Duty role to manage compliance with media policies

app-role.name: HWR_WORKFORCE_REPUTATION_ADMINISTRATION_DUTY
app-role.description: Duty role to administer workforce reputation applications

app-role.name: HWR_WORKFORCE_REPUTATION_MANAGEMENT_DUTY
app-role.description: Duty role to manage organization and employee workforce reputation

app-role.name: FND_APP_CREATE_ESS_JOB_DUTY_HCM
app-role.description: Manages the definition of scheduled jobs.

resource-type.name: ESSRequestSimpleResourceType
resource-type.description: Resource type for simple ESS request access control

permission-set.name: HWR_MANAGE_WORKFORCE_REPUTATION_ADMINISTRATION_PRIV
permission-set.description: Manage workforce reputation administration and external applications

permission-set.name: HWR_REVIEW_ORGANIZATION_OR_EMPLOYEE_COMPLIANCE_PRIV
permission-set.description: Review information about organization or employee compliance with media policies

permission-set.name: HWR_REVIEW_ORGANIZATION_OR_EMPLOYEE_REPUTATION_PRIV
permission-set.description: Review information about organization or employee reputation

permission-set.name: FND_MANAGE_SCHEDULED_JOB_DEFINITION_PRIV
